description: The current value of a metric describing a kubernetes object (for example, `hits-per-second` on an Ingress object).

averageValue.description: The current value of the average of the metric across all relevant Pods (as a quantity)

currentValue.description: The current value of the metric (as a quantity).

metricName.description: The name of the metric in question.

selector.description: The string-encoded form of a standard kubernetes label selector for the given metric. When set in the object metric source, it is passed as an additional parameter to the metrics server for more specific metrics scoping. When unset, just the `metricName` will be used to gather metrics.
